document_data.name: House Ebsar
document_data.mainbody: ring the [[Darkening]] in the mid-1480s DR, House Ebsar refused to join an alliance with [[Szind]], [[Avithoul]], and [[Dun'Robar]] that caused the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]]. As the war was dictated by [[Lolth]] and planned by High Priestess [[Hekta Szind]] in order to find the [[Thread of the Weave]], this was considered a grave insult to be avenged later.
document_data.History: During the [[Darkening]] in the mid-1480s DR, House Ebsar refused to join an alliance with [[Szind]], [[Avithoul]], and [[Dun'Robar]] that caused the [[Sschindylryn invasion of Eveningstar]]. As the war was dictated by [[Lolth]] and planned by High Priestess [[Hekta Szind]] in order to find the [[Thread of the Weave]], this was considered a grave insult to be avenged later.
